created_by: oscd.community, Teymur Kheirkhabarov @HeirhabarovT, Zach Stanford @svch0st, Tim Shelton
name: Suspicious Remote Logon with Explicit Credentials
description: Detects suspicious processes logging on with explicit credentials
false_positives: Administrators that use the RunAS command or scheduled tasks
query: (winlog.channel:Security AND (event.code:4648 AND process.executable:(/.*\\[Cc][Mm][Dd]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Pp][Ww][Ss][Hh]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Rr][Ss]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Mm][Ii][Cc]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Nn][Ee][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Nn][Ee][Tt]1\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Rr][Ee][Gg]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)) AND (NOT ((winlog.event_data.TargetServerName:/[Ll][Oo][Cc][Aa][Ll][Hh][Oo][Ss][Tt]/) OR (user.name:/.*$/ AND winlog.event_data.TargetUserName:/.*$/))))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:Security AND (event.code:4648 AND process.executable:(*\\cmd.exe OR *\\powershell.exe OR *\\pwsh.exe OR *\\winrs.exe OR *\\wmic.exe OR *\\net.exe OR *\\net1.exe OR *\\reg.exe)) AND (NOT ((winlog.event_data.TargetServerName:localhost) OR (user.name:*$ AND winlog.event_data.TargetUserName:*$))))`
